name: Methodica
description:
Methodica is a small experimental exploration game. Test your navigation skills to escape this weird place. Or maybe you'd prefer to stay for some time to uncover what it hides in its geometrical world? Whichever you choose, just follow the way of light. It's the only source you can rely on here. And take your time, don't hurry.

Play time: 10-20 min

Controlls: WASD
